title: Gumboots Australia for DOS
material_description: Floppy disk videogame. One 3 1/2 inch floppy disk and manual in cardboard box
brief_description: Explore Australia and help solve a plethora of mysteries in Gumboots Australia. In this this adventure and educational game, the player is tasked with solving cases as an investigator for the Gumboots Enquiry Agency, a job that will take the player all over the country. The player will get to visit locations as varied as Kakadu to Coober Pedy in their hunt for the next clue. Getting there is its own challenge, as different modes of transportation can cost time and money. Random events along the way aid or hinder the player’s quest to solve the case.
